title: Wisp in a Bottle
summaries: The Wisp in a Bottle is a Hardmode, post-Plantera light pet-summoning item that spawns a light-providing Wisp that follows the player around. While active, it is similar to the Flickerwick. The Wisp emits cyan light and is brighter and keeps better pace with the player than other light pets, except the Suspicious Looking Tentacle and Jewel of Light(Desktop, Console and Mobile versions) which have the same light radius. It moves in accordance with the direction keys the player is pressing, although it is oriented above the player's head by default. The Wisp's movement range appears to be about 7 tiles to the left, right, and below the player's hitbox and 7 tiles above the Wisp's normal starting position. The Wisp in a Bottle has a 1/400 (0.25%) / 799/160000 (0.5%) chance of being dropped by Blue Armored Bones, Rusty Armored Bones, and Hell Armored Bones.

statistics.Tooltip: Summons a Wisp to provide light
